Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher will generally guide you in the exact direction. GenAI gives every paths and many are not relevant.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is a lot more overwhelming due to the density, but teacher will more likely be concise and at worst vague.
